channel.title: Pages on Ray Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Ray Yang

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! I’m a passionate self-taught developer originally from Taiwan, now living in London and working as a software engineer. My focus is mostly on backend development using Golang, and I am fascinated by devops, where it can automate a lot of things and make life a lot easier. I’ve had the opportunity to work with a diverse range of industries, including Blockchain, FinTech, Education, Healthcare, and Retail, building everything from small business websites to custom web applications.

item.title: Work
item.description: Projects Tools & Technologies Bequest Golang, CI/CD, Docker,Microservices, Kubernetes, React, Typescript Cool X Wallet Java, Netty, AWS Cloud HSM, Docker, Blockchain CoolWallet S Golang, Blockchain, CI/CD, React Native Spark API REST API, Blockchain, Python Sygna Bridge Demo React, Redux, Saga, Typescript Resumake React, JavaScript Bequest Personalised pay-as-you-go life insurance and online wills. I mainly focused on building the backend and leveraging microservices architectures to achieve the Performance, Reliability, Availability and Scalability (PRAS).
